pullrequest.title: Remove override of OnVisibilityChange for display plugins

content.raw: the bottling issue is turning out to be complicated \([#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-rendering/issues/28](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-rendering/issues/28)\) and is starting to block a few PRs on this repo. If we don't want to merge these PRs to default until OS X is fixed, what do you think about targeting these PRs to a display\_plugins branch so that we can get the PRs reviewed and merged, and then when the ignition rendering bottle is released we can merge display\_plugins into default?
content.html: the bottling issue is turning out to be complicated (#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-rendering/issues/28) and is starting to block a few PRs on this repo. If we don't want to merge these PRs to default until OS X is fixed, what do you think about targeting these PRs to a display_plugins branch so that we can get the PRs reviewed and merged, and then when the ignition rendering bottle is released we can merge display_plugins into default?
